TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProxyWebPartManager extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 為開發人員提供了當 控制項已在內容頁面的關聯主版頁面 (Master Page) 中宣告時在內容頁面中宣告靜態連接的方法。

span.span: Provides a way for developers to declare static connections in a content page when a control has been declared in the content page's associated master page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項有為特定案例中宣告靜態連接內容中的頁面時主版頁面中的控制項已經宣告。The control exists for the particular scenario of declaring static connections in content pages when a control has already been declared in a master page. 根據設計，會使用 Web 組件控制項的網頁必須包含一個 （且只有一個）管理頁面上的所有 Web 組件控制項的控制項。By design, a Web page that uses Web Parts controls must contain one (and only one) control that manages all Web Parts controls on the page. 當 Web 組件的應用程式使用主版頁面時，常會放置控制項在主版頁面中，因為所有內容的頁面會在執行的階段和單一主版頁面與合併控制項將會管理所有 Web 組件控制項從所有的內容頁面。When a Web Parts application uses master pages, it is common to place the control in the master page, because all the content pages are merged with the master page at run time and the single control will manage all the Web Parts controls from all content pages. 不過，當開發人員想要這類應用程式的內容頁面中宣告靜態連接，它們可能不按照面臨限制。However, when developers want to declare static connections in the content pages of such an application, they might seem to face a limitation. 靜態的 Web 組件連接可以宣告只是藉由新增 <`asp:webpartconnection>`做為子系的項目``項目，而其本身必須是子系``項目。A static Web Parts connection can be declared only by adding an <`asp:webpartconnection>` element as a child of a `` element, which itself must be a child of a `` element. 但是由於控制項已經宣告在主版頁面中，與其中一個允許控制項，開發人員不能宣告其他来加入靜態連接的內容頁面中的控制項。But because the control was already declared in the master page, and is the one permitted control, developers cannot declare additional controls in the content pages to add static connections. 控制會取代在此案例中的控制項。The control takes the place of the control in this scenario. 開發人員宣告``項目，而不是``項目，其內容的頁面和可以再宣告靜態連接做為子元素。Developers declare an `` element instead of an `` element in their content pages, and can then declare static connections as child elements. 在執行階段，在連線控制項只會加入至集合控制，並將其視為任何其他連線。At run time, the connections in the control are simply added to the collection of the control and treated like any other connection. 因為控制項只適用於此特定開發案例，它更具有有限的功能比類別。Because the control is used only in this particular development scenario, it has more limited functionality than the class. 事實上，雖然控制項做為 proxy，以包含靜態連接控制項在內容頁中，它不是繼承自控制項。In fact, although the control acts as a proxy to contain static connections for the control in content pages, it does not inherit from the control. 直接從它繼承類別，並覆寫僅提供少數的基底成員。It inherits directly from the class, and overrides only a few of the base members. ， ，和覆寫和禁止使用的值指派給屬性。The , , and properties are overridden and assigned values that prevent them from being used. 其他繼承的屬性會覆寫來調整其設計階段行為，但是它們必須與基底屬性相同的行為。Other inherited properties are overridden to adjust their design-time behavior, but otherwise they have the same behavior as the base properties. 這些包括和屬性。These include the and properties. 最後，類別有一個非繼承的屬性。Finally, the class has one non-inherited property. 屬性會傳回它自己的靜態連接的集合 (物件)。The property returns its own collection of static connections (a object). 與方法，類別同樣會覆寫只有一些方法，通常以限制它使用。As for methods, the class similarly overrides only a few methods, mostly to restrict their use. 繼承藉由擲回例外狀況，如果呼叫，方法由無法使用。The inherited method is made unusable by throwing an exception if called. 方法一律會傳回空的控制項集合，其作用就是防止它可以包含控制項的集合。The method always returns an empty control collection, which has the effect of preventing it from being able to contain a collection of controls. 最後，方法呼叫的基底的方法，然後將指定連接所參考的集合屬性屬性控制項。Finally, the method calls the base method, and then assigns the collection of connections referenced by the property to the property of the control. 這是彙總所有的內容頁面中宣告的靜態連接效果並使其所維護的連接集合的一部分主版頁面中的控制項。This has the effect of rolling up all the static connections declared in all content pages and making them part of the connections collection maintained by the control in the master page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別宣告中使用主版頁面的應用程式的內容頁面上的靜態連接。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to declare static connections on content pages in an application that uses master pages. 此範例包含五個部分：The example has five parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載使用者控制項，內容頁面中，主版網頁和應用程式控制項。A master Web page that hosts the user control, the content pages, and the control for the application. - 裝載的內容 Web 網頁控制項、 兩個自訂控制項和靜態連接來連接兩個控制項。A content Web page that hosts a control, the two custom controls, and a static connection to connect the two controls. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是裝載的主版頁面頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting master page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是介面和控制項的原始程式碼。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 來源檔案包含一個簡單的介面，名為`IZipCode`。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 另外還有名為類別`ZipCodeWebPart`，實作介面，並且會做為提供者控制。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是實作介面的唯一成員的回呼方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 方法只會傳回介面的執行個體。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 請注意，方法標示為`ConnectionProvider`中它的中繼資料屬性。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 這是將方法識別提供者的連接點的回呼方法的機制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 其他類別的名稱為`WeatherWebPart`，並作為連接取用者。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 這個類別具有名為的方法`GetZipCode`所取得的執行個體`IZipCode`介面從提供者控制。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 請注意，這個方法標示為與取用者的連接點方法`ConnectionConsumer`中它的中繼資料屬性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#4)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是主版頁面。The third part of the code example is the master page. 您應該採取下列原始程式碼，並將它儲存在檔案中，其命名為 MasterPageCS.master 或 MasterPageVB.master （根據哪些語言使用）。You should take the following source code and save it in a file, naming it MasterPageCS.master or MasterPageVB.master (depending on which language you use). 請注意，主版頁面包含`Register`指示詞，以註冊的使用者控制項，及其參考的使用者控制項本身的網頁主體中。Note that the master page contains a `Register` directive to register the user control, and it references the user control itself in the body of the page. 主版頁面也會宣告單一``用於這個頁面及所有相關的內容頁面項目。The master page also declares the single `` element used for this page and all related content pages. 最後，主版頁面有``宣告中插入的內容頁面的頁面的點項目。Finally, the master page has an `` element that declares the point in the page where the content page is inserted. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/MasterPageCS.master#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/MasterPageVB.master#1)] 程式碼範例的第四個部分是內容頁面。The fourth part of the code example is the content page. 您應該複製下列原始程式碼，並將它儲存在.aspx 副檔名的檔案。You should copy the following source code and save it in a file with an .aspx extension. 請注意，其`Page`指示詞包含`MasterFile`屬性來參考主版頁面。Notice that its `Page` directive contains a `MasterFile` attribute to refer to the master page. 此外，此頁面具有`Register`來登錄此檔案包含的動態編譯的自訂 App_Code 資料夾中的指示詞參與連線的控制項。Also, this page has a `Register` directive to register the file in the App_Code folder that contains the dynamically compiled custom controls that participate in the connection. 內``標記的頁面上，沒有 <`asp:proxywebpartmanager>`項目子系與``項目，而後者又子系``宣告連接的詳細資料的項目。Within the `` tags of the page, there is an <`asp:proxywebpartmanager>` element, with a child `` element, which in turn has a child `` element to declare the details of the connection. 內`

summary.span: 覆寫基底屬性，以防止 控制項包含控制項。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent the control from containing controls.
Always returns an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底的方法，以避免控制項包含與傳回控制項的集合。The method overrides the base method to prevent the control from containing and returning collections of controls. 其唯一的目的是要啟用應用程式中，會使用主版頁面的內容頁面中宣告的靜態連接。Its only purpose is to enable static connections to be declared in content pages within an application that uses master pages.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool EnableTheming { get; set; }
.property instance bool EnableTheming
Public Overrides Property EnableTheming As Boolean
public: virtual property bool EnableTheming { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 覆寫基底屬性，以防止使用佈景主題。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used.

value.span: 永遠傳回 ，以防止使用佈景主題。

span.span: Always returns , to prevent themes from being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫基底屬性，以搭配使用時，防止佈景主題控制項。The property overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used with the control. 這是為了防止它進入衝突，以搭配使用的所有主題主版頁面中的控制項 (其屬性一律會傳回`true`)。This is to prevent it coming into conflict with any themes being used with the control in the master page (its property always returns `true`).

exception.span: 呼叫端嘗試指定這個屬性的值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Focus ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Focus() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Focus ()
public: override void Focus();

summary.span: 覆寫基底方法，以防止呼叫方法。

span.span: Overrides the base method to prevent the method from being called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法，並擲回例外狀況，如果任何呼叫端所要呼叫的方法。The method overrides the base method and throws an exception if any caller attempts to call the method. 這是因為繼承方法針對控制項使用者介面 (UI)，但控制項沒有 ui，並因此不會有不需要將焦點設定。This is because the inherited method is designed for controls with a user interface (UI), but the control has no UI and therefore has no need to set the focus.

exception.span: 呼叫端嘗試呼叫這個方法。

span.span: A caller tries to call this method.

summary.span: 引發 事件並初始化控制項。

span.span: Raises the event and initializes the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫基底的方法，並再執行工作，以初始化控制項。The method calls the base method, and then carries out tasks to initialize the control. 重要的工作，這個方法是指定連接所參考的集合屬性控制項的集合。An important task of this method is to assign the collection of connections referenced by the property to the control's collection.

exception.span: 來自相關主版頁面的 控制項是 。

span.span: The control from the associated master page is .

summary.span: 覆寫基底屬性，以防止指定值。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.
Always returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性覆寫從搭配使用的基底屬性，以防止值指派給它，具有造成面板控制項。The property overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned to it, which has the effect of preventing skins from being used with the control. 這是因為控制項絕不會洩露頁面上的使用者介面 (UI)。This is done because the control never exposes a user interface (UI) on a page. 相同的行為由實作控制其屬性。The same behavior is implemented by the control for its property.

exception.span: 呼叫端嘗試指定這個屬性的值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection StaticConnections { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection StaticConnections
Public ReadOnly Property StaticConnections As ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection ^ StaticConnections { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得內容頁面上 項目中所宣告的靜態連接集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of static connections declared within the element on a content page.

value.span: ，包含 項目中所宣告的所有靜態 物件。

span.span: A that contains all static objects declared within an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性參考的集合中宣告物件``項目。The property references the collection of objects declared in an `` element. 這個集合中包含連接的靜態連接加入控制項 (所參考其集合)，以及相關聯的任何其他連接一樣的處理控制項。The connections contained in this collection are added to the static connections of the controls (referenced by its collection), and treated exactly like any other connections associated with the control. 若要對應的宣告式項目屬性是``項目。The declarative element that corresponds to the property is the `` element. 使用主版頁面的應用程式中``項目新增為子系``內容頁上的項目和``依次項目會加入做為子系``項目。In an application that uses master pages, the `` element is added as a child of the `` element on a content page, and an `` element in turn is added as a child of the `` element. 多個``項目可以新增至一個``項目，並多個內容頁面可以宣告靜態連接主版頁面應用程式的一部分。Multiple `` elements can be added to one `` element, and multiple content pages can declare static connections as part of a master pages application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property on the class. 這個程式碼範例示範中所宣告的內容頁面的程式碼的相關部分控制和靜態連接。This code example shows only the relevant portion of the code from the content page that declares the control and the static connection. 針對執行的程式碼範例，以及如何設定它們，描述所需的其他頁面，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the other pages required to run the code example, and a description of how to set them up, see the Example section of the class overview. 下列程式碼是所宣告的內容頁面``做為子系的項目``項目。The following code is the content page that declares the `` element as a child of the `` element. 也請注意，`Button1_Click`方法會檢查的計數屬性控制，並將它寫入至頁面。Also note that the `Button1_Click` method checks the count of the property on the control and writes it to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/contentPage1CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/contentPage1VB.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**WebPartManager 資訊**按鈕，並觀察的相關資訊控制項在主版頁面中，而內容頁面中的控制項。After you load the page in a browser, click the **WebPartManager Information** button and observe the information about the control in the master page, and the control in the content page. 比方說，請注意，它們都沒有相同的計數中追蹤靜態連接其個別內容 (屬性)。For example, note that they both have the same count in their respective properties that track static connections (the property).

value.span: 永遠傳回 ，以防止控制項成為可見。

span.span: Always returns , to prevent the control from being made visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫基底屬性，以防止曾進行可見的控制項。The property overrides the base property to prevent the control from ever being made visible. 控制，例如控制、 沒有使用者介面 (UI) 以及永遠不會顯示給使用者。The control, like the control, has no user interface (UI) and is never displayed to the user.

exception.span: 呼叫端嘗試指定這個屬性的值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
